metadata.title: CVE-2019-10912 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Symfony before 2.8.50, 3.x before 3.4.26, 4.x before 4.1.12, and 4.2.xbefore 4.2.7, it is possible to cache objects that may contain bad userinput. On serialization or unserialization, this could result in thedeletion of files that the current user has access to. This is related tosymfony/cache and symfony/phpunit-bridge.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
